Title: Coder vulnerable to post-auth URL redirection to untrusted site ('Open Redirect')
Description: An issue on Coder's login page allows attackers to craft a Coder URL that when clicked by a logged in user could redirect them to a website the attacker controls, e.g. https://google.com.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.3.1 before 2.14.4, all versions starting from 2.15.0 before 2.15.3, all versions starting from 2.16.0 before 2.16.1, version 2.16.0
